workflow_instructions.mode_overview: Automates creating release notes for new Roo Code versions. Fetches pull requests from GitHub, analyzes changes, and generates notes based on doc standards.

step.details: User provides the new version number (e.g., 3.20.3) to start.

tools.tool: list_files - Find previous version in docs/update-notes

step.details: List files in docs/update-notes to find the last version file and set the range for fetching changes.

phase.name: gather_technical_information
phase.description: Collect PR data from GitHub. Skipped if user provides a PR number list.

step.details: If user gives a list of PR numbers, skip to 'process_each_pr' phase.
Get commit dates for new and previous version tags to set a date range.

step.action: Search for merged PRs within date range
step.details: Use release date range to search for merged PRs. Query: `is:pr is:merged repo:RooCodeInc/Roo-Code merged:YYYY-MM-DD..YYYY-MM-DD`

phase.name: process_each_pr
phase.description: Process PRs with subtasks. Each subtask investigates one PR, storing findings in a temp file.

subtask_workflow.overview: For each PR, create a subtask with new_task. Each subtask investigates one PR and appends findings to temp_pr_analysis.md.

step.details: Create a release-notes-writer subtask to investigate the PR.
step.message_format:
Investigate PR #[number] for release notes v[version].
Task: 1. Get PR details with github.get_pull_request 2. Extract linked issues from PR description (e.g., "Fixes #123") 3. Get details for linked issues with github.get_issue 4. Analyze and categorize the change (bug fix, feature, etc.) 5. Append findings to temp_pr_analysis.md in the specified format. Use insert_content with line 0.

step.details: The subtask handles these steps: fetch PR/issue details, analyze change, write findings to temp_pr_analysis.md, and report completion.
After subtask is confirmed complete, create the next PR investigation subtask.

subtask_workflow.completion_per_pr: After each subtask writes its findings, move to the next PR.

phase.name: compile_final_release_notes
phase.description: Read temporary analysis file and compile findings into the final release notes.
phase.steps:
Read temporary analysis file
Read temp_pr_analysis.md, which contains all PR investigation findings.
Group and organize findings
Group PRs by category (Bug Fixes, QOL Improvements, etc.) based on the analysis.
Format for release notes
Convert findings into final release note format with acknowledgments and direct language.
<step number="4"gt; Clean up temporary file
Optionally remove the temporary analysis file after completion.

phase.name: generate_documentation
phase.description: Create and update all documentation files.

step.details: Create docs/update-notes/vX.Y.Z.mdx with correct title, date, and sections.
Add new release entry to the list.
Add new release to the "Update Notes" sidebar.
For patch releases, update the parent minor/major release file (e.g., update v3.20.mdx for v3.20.3).

phase.name: discord_formatting
phase.description: Generate Discord-formatted release notes via a subtask.
phase.when_to_use: When user asks for Discord formatting.

step.details: Create a subtask to convert the release notes file to Discord format.
step.task_instructions:
Generate Discord-formatted release notes for version X.Y.Z.
Requirements: 1. Strip all PR links and numbers (#XXXX). 2. Keep structure and content. 3. Prepend https://docs.roocode.com/ to all internal doc links. 4. If compressing, summarize with this format: ## :wrench: [Other Improvements and Fixes](https://docs.roocode.com/update-notes/vX.Y.Z#section-anchor) This release includes X other fixes covering [list key areas]. Thanks to contributors: [list contributors]. 5. Add footer link: [Full X.Y.Z Release Notes](https://docs.roocode.com/update-notes/vX.Y.Z)
Convert docs/update-notes/vX.Y.Z.mdx to Discord format.

step.details: If user asks to compress sections, the subtask should summarize changes, thank only contributors from those sections, and link to the full notes.

completion_criteria.criterion: Release notes file created with correct formatting.
All PRs analyzed and described by user benefit.
Combined release notes updated for patch releases.
Final release notes include only items from the version's changelog.
